K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:422a-20: bud med kyi dngos por 'gyur ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:422b-9: rigs kyi bu mo de dag la srung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:422b-12: de dag thams cad kyi yon tan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:422b-13: re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par longs spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:422b-15: bde ba chen por byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:422b-16: bsam pa dang 'dod pa thams cad yang dag par 'grub par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:422b-17: las thams cad zad par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:422b-18: dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:422b-19: rmi lam ngan pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:422b-20: g-yul thams cad las rgyal bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:422b-25: mthu che bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:422b-29: mi ma yin pa thams cad dbang du byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:422b-33: chu thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:422b-34: lung bstan pa'i bar dag thob par byed pa'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi dag yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:422b-35: de dag mnyan cing bzung ste bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:422b-38: yi ger 'brir 'jug pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:423a-1: mo dag ni yon tan de dag thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:423a-2: de nas de'i tshe sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g-yos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:423a-3: ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:423a-9: ras bcos bu zung dag gsol te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:423a-10: legs so zhes bya ba gsol nas bcom ldan 'das /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:423a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:423a-20: lo ka bi lo ke lo aa ti kr'ante /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:423a-21: satva aa ba lo ke ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:423a-22: sarba ta th'a ga ta aa dhish'a te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:423a-23: sarba aa sha pa ri p'u ra ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:423a-25: na ra de ba p'u dzi te ta th'a ga ta dzny'a na da de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:423a-26: ta th'a ga ta aa dhishsh'a ne na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:423a-27: sarba lo ka ma su kh'a bha ba tu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:423a-28: b'urba ksharma ksha pa ya tu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:423a-30: sarba ye bhya ta th'a ga ta aa dhi sh'a ne na sv'ah'a /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:423a-32: gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:423a-33: de bzhin gshegs pa sum khris gsungs shing byin gyis brlabs pa yin no //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:423a-40: nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:423b-2: gang la la zhig 'di snyam du bdag gis ji ltar na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:423b-3: de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i yon tan de dag thams cad 'thob par 'gyur snyam du sems pa des nang par sngar langs te sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:423b-9: khro ba yongs su spangs pa'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:423b-10: rtse gcig pa'i sems kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa shin tu rgya cher byas la phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas te gang 'dod pa yid la byas nas me tog la bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad bya zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:423b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa la re re nas dbul bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:423b-12: des na de'i re ba thams cad yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:423b-13: rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar yang 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:423b-14: dam pa gang 'dod pa de thob par yang 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:423b-15: 'chi ba'i tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar yang 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:423b-16: shi 'phos kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:423b-20: brtson 'grus dang ldan par yang 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:423b-21: dgra thams cad kyang de'i dbang du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:424a-0: gzungs 'di bshad pa na srog chags drug khri mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob @424a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:424a-1: par gyur nas de dag thams cad las kyi sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol zhing bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:424a-2: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:424a-4: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dam 'cha' ba mi 'jigs pa'i gzi brjid ces bgyi ba'i gzungs mchis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:424a-5: bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs med bkod pa gzi brjid rgyal po'i spyan sngar de bzung lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:424a-6: bzung nas kyang sems can thams cad la bshad lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:424a-8: deng slan chad bdag gis mngon 'tshal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:424a-9: gang gi rna lam du gzungs de grags par gyur tam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:424a-10: glo bur chud par gyur pa de'i lus nyam nga ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:424a-11: nyon mongs pa sna tshogs sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:424a-26: mi ma lags pa dag gis mtho 'tsham pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:424b-0: gnod pa bgyid par 'gyur ba de ni @424b gnas ma mchis lags so //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:424b-2: bdag gis chos smra ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:424b-3: chos nyan pa de dag gi don du nyan pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:424b-4: ri mor bgyid pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:424b-5: mchod par bgyid pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:424b-6: 'dzin par bgyid pa rnams kyi re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:424b-7: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dam bca' ba'i phyag rgya dag stsal bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:424b-8: na ma: sarba ta th'a ga t'a n'am/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:424b-18: ta th'a ga ta a'a dzny'a pa l'a ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:424b-20: sarba bya dhi na sarba p'a pam n'a sha ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:424b-22: yi the ba si tam pha ra ma /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:424b-23: yan ya me ba aa bhi pr'a yan tsa mi tanta me ba sa mram dhya tu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:424b-28: ma bi lamba da ri sha ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:424b-32: buddha aa dhi shsh'a ne na sv'ah'a /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:424b-33: gzungs 'di brjod pa na sa chen po mtho ba dang dma' bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:424b-34: gnod sbyin dang srin po thams cad kyang rab tu dngangs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:424b-37: mi ma yin pa'i bar dag kyang ngo mtshar du gyur nas sems can chen po rab tu grub par byed pa'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bshad pa ni legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:424b-38: legs so zhes bya ba byin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:424b-39: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:425a-1: gang la la zhig byang chub sems dpa'i sa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:425a-4: longs spyod kyi dbang phyug gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:425a-5: rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gam; rig sngags 'chang ba nyid dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:425a-10: tshe ring po nyid 'tshal ba des snga nas bsnyen par bgyis la dgung zla yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad la tsandan dkar po las rdo rje 'dzin pa rta gang du dgod cing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:425a-11: snying gar sku gdung stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:425a-12: sku gdung dang bcas pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:425a-13: rig sngags 'chang yang dag par dbugs 'byin par bgyid pa bgyis la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:425a-14: gtsang mas bdug spos kyis bdug cing gdugs mtshan gcig tu smyung ba bgyis la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:425a-15: de nas tshes brgyad nas tshes bco lnga'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs bzhugs pa'i gnas gtsang mar tsandan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor bgyis la bum pa gang ba bzhi'ang gzhag par bgyi; phyogs bzhir yang ro dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:425a-18: 'o thug gi gtor ma dag stsal la rad pa dkar po bgos te sems rtse gcig tu bgyis nas dus gsum du bdug spos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:425a-21: mar me dag gis mchod pa chen po bgyi zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'ang mchod pa bgyis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:425b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag @425b bgyis nas sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad la bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:425b-1: re re nas lag na rdo rje la bsnun par bgyi'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:425b-5: de nas dam pa ci 'tshal ba'ang stsal bar bgyi'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:425b-7: dgos pa thams cad kyang yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:425b-8: bro nad ma mchis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:425b-10: sdig pa thams cad bral bar 'gyur zhing yon tan stong yang 'byung bar 'gyur lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:425b-11: 'gum pa'i tshe na'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das stong mthong bar 'gyur lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:425b-12: bdag mthong bar yang stsal bar bgyi lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:425b-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:425b-14: lag na rdo rje legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:425b-16: phyag rgya 'di ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis 'da' bar bya ba ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:425b-17: 'di la som nyi med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:425b-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:425b-22: ci'i slad du ting nge 'dzin 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs sems can la gzigs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:425b-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:426a-1: pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:426a-2: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs de las ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:426a-3: gzungs kyi sgo thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:426a-10: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:426a-11: gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las byung ba lhag par g-yo ba dang bral bar g-yo ba dag rab tu shes shing sems can 'di dag ni bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:426a-12: legs par spyod pa'i las byed la /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:426a-17: nyes par spyod pa'i las byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:426a-18: sdig pa spyod par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:426a-19: shes nas sdig pa'i lta bar gyur pa'i sems can de dag la chos ston par byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:426a-20: sdig pa thams cad las zlog bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:426a-21: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la 'god par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:426a-22: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:426a-26: ser sna dag sel bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:426a-27: sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:426b-0: dge 'dun @426b dag la dad pa rab tu thob nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su skye zhing nam du'ang sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:426b-1: yid mi bde bar mi 'gyur bas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:426b-3: de'i phyir ting nge 'dzin 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs sems can la gzigs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:426b-4: 'di thos pa'i sems can rnams ni phyir mi ldog par nges pa'i sa 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:426b-7: ci'i slad du rigs kyi bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:426b-8: rigs kyi bu mo de dag lung bstan par 'gyur lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:426b-10: dgra bcom pa nyid kyang dka' ba lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:426b-11: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lta ci smos kyang mi 'tshol lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:426b-12: de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:426b-13: dka' ba spyod pa ji tsam zhig tu 'gyur lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:426b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:426b-16: ngas dang po sems bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:426b-17: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:426b-18: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:426b-19: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:426b-20: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:426b-21: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa gang yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:427a-2: bran mo dag yongs su btang bar gyur pa gang yin pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:427a-3: dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba snga ma 'di ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:427a-8: 'dzin pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:427a-9: gzhan dag la'ang yang dag par ston par byed pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba gang yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:427a-10: chos smra ba de dag la'ang mchod pa byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:427a-11: bsnyen bkur byed pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba gang yin pa de'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:427a-13: nges kun chub par byas shing bshad pa'i chos de dag thams cad la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:427a-17: bsnyen bkur byas te yi ger 'bri pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:427a-18: yi ger 'brir 'jug pa gang yin pa de bas ni gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'bri ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:427a-22: yang dag par ston par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:427a-24: de las bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba ches mang du yongs su sdud par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:427b-0: de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang @427b dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:427b-2: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:427b-8: yi ger 'brir 'jug pa'i bsod nams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:427b-9: de ltar dka' ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:427b-11: sems can gang dag sdig pa kun tu spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:427b-14: bro gar la mngon par dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:427b-15: mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:427b-19: mi bde ba la bde bar 'du shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:427b-23: rdeg pa la mngon par dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:427b-25: yid la byed par mi 'gyur ba de dag ni sdig pa'i las kyi gzhi de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:427b-26: mi shes pa des mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin cing rga ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:427b-29: 'chi bas yongs su zin pas 'chi ba'i tshe na yongs su gdung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:427b-30: dmigs pa na so so nas dur khrod dang 'dra 'kho nar mthong zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:427b-31: dge ba'i sems bskyed par yang mi 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:427b-32: dad pa mi phyed pa thob par yang mi 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:427b-33: de dag de nas shi 'phos nas kyang sdug bsngal dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur bas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:427b-34: lung bstan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:427b-35: de bzhin gshegs pa ma mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:428a-1: pa dag gis ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:428a-7: dad par yang mi nus la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:428a-8: chos smra ba de la'ang bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:428a-11: mchod pa bya bar yang mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:428a-12: rigs kyi bu; gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod par 'gyur ba'i yul der ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:428a-13: de nas ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes bya ba gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:428a-18: bdag cag gis kyang chos smra ba de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:428a-19: chos nyan pa de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pas bsnyen bkur bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:428a-23: bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang nye bar bsgrub par bgyi lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:428a-24: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'ang rgyas par bgyi bsrung bar bgyi ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:428a-25: des na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas par yang 'gyur lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:428a-26: de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor rnams la rnam par gzigs te bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:428b-0: legs @428b so; ;khyed cag gis de bzhin du gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:428b-6: rgya 'gal bar byed na'ang lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:428b-7: srog la mi ta bar byas la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:428b-11: chos smra ba de la'ang bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:428b-14: grong khyer de dag kyang 'jigs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:428b-17: 'khrug pa dag las bsrung bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:428b-19: rigs kyi bu mo de dag la'ang rtag par rgyun du bsam par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:428b-20: de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:428b-21: bskal pa grangs med stong phrag bye snyed du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:428b-22: sangs rgyas 'byung ba lan 'ga' rnyed pa la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:428b-23: phyi ma'i dus na 'gyod par mi 'gyur bar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:428b-24: rigs kyi bu rnams bag yod chos nyon cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:428b-25: yon tan nyan cing mngon par dad byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:428b-26: de dag gis ni ting 'dzin rnyed mi dka'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:428b-27: gang gis rkang gnyis gtso bo rnams la ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:428b-28: bskal pa bye ba gangg'a'i bye snyed du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:428b-29: nor dang 'bru dang de bzhin gos dang rgyan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:428b-30: spos dang phreng ba byug pa phul ba bas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:428b-31: gang gis mdo sde 'di la dad byas te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:428b-32: nyan cing klog la yi ger 'bri byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:428b-33: de la bsod nams tshad ni yod min te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:429a-1: gshegs pas de snyed tshad ma gsungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:429a-2: rtag tu bag yod dgon par rten byed cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:429a-3: sems gzhan med par bsam gtan dag sgom dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:429a-4: sdug pa'i bu dang bu mo sbyin byed cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:429a-5: lag pa rkang pa yongs su gtong ba bas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:429a-6: gang su mdo sde 'di ni 'dzin byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:429a-7: de ni de bas bsod nams mang po 'thob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:429a-8: mdo mchog 'di ni nor sbyin byed pa ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:429a-9: de yi ngan song kun kyang rtag tu spangs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:429a-10: 'di ni nor dang 'bru sbyin byed pa ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:429a-11: gang zhig mdo sde rnam dag 'di 'dzin pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:429a-12: de la yon tan kun kyang mi dkon zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:429a-13: de la tshe stobs brtson 'grus mod pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:429a-14: 'dren pa sangs rgyas 'od dpag med mthong zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:429a-15: ngas de sangs rgyas byang chub lung yang bstan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:429a-16: de la nam yang sdig pa yod min cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:429a-17: bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams kyang mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:429a-18: de la rtag tu las gang 'byung 'gyur ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:429a-19: sems gdung lus lan ba'ang de bzhin du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:429a-20: klad pa na bas thams cad zad 'gyur zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:429a-21: de ni nam yang rnam par ltung mi 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:429a-22: des ni mthong ba'i chos la'ang yon tan kun //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:429a-23: ji ltar bsam zhing 'dod pas 'thob par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:429a-24: de ltar rtag tu dge slong pho mo dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:429a-25: dge bsnyen rnams dang rgyal pos rtag tu ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:429a-26: mi yi dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:429a-27: chos smra ba la rjes su gus byas te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:429b-0: mdo sde 'di ni @429b rtag tu gzung bya zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:429b-1: 'dzin pa la yang rtag tu bsnyen bkur bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:429b-2: spos dang phreng ba byug pa rnams kyis ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:429b-3: bsnyen bkur byas te yi ger 'brir yang gzhug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:429b-4: phyi ma'i dus la rga nas gdungs gyur la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:429b-5: 'khrug pa stong phrag du mas g-yen spyo zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:429b-6: sems dmyal yi dvags rnams su yongs 'khyams dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:429b-7: za ma ma ning smad par bya ba dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:429b-8: dmus long nyid dang ro dang khyi yi dri //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:429b-9: rigs dma' bud med rnams su skye bar byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:429b-10: phrag dog che zhing rtag tu sdig byed la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:429b-11: khro bas zil non rtag tu ser sna can //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:429b-12: sangs rgyas chos la gus par ma byas pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:429b-13: de ni de 'dra'i rigs su skye 'gyur la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:429b-14: der yang sdug bsngal tshor ba myong 'gyur zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:429b-15: de ni phyi ma'i dus la'ang gdung bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:429b-16: de phyir gang dag 'dzin cing ston byed pa; ;de dag gis ni rtag tu mchod par bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:429b-17: gang gis de la yongs su spyo ba dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:429b-18: smad cing brdegs la bcing ba byas gyur pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:429b-19: de ni nga yang yongs su spyos pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:429b-20: 'dzin la phu dud byas na nga la'ang byas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:429b-21: de phyir de dag gis ni chos smra dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:429b-22: gang zhig 'di 'dzin 'bri zhing klog byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:429b-23: de dag la ni rtag tu bsnyen bkur zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:430a-0: tshig 'jam snyan pa rgyun du brjod par bya; ;de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te bcom ldan @430a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:430a-3: bdag gis rnam par lta ba'i cho 'phrul zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs mchis par rjes su dran te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:430a-4: bdag gis sngon de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mdzad ye shes tog ces bgyi ba'i spyan sngar de thos shing bzung lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:430a-5: de nyan cing bzung la bcangs shing bklags te gzhan dag la'ang bsgrags shing bsnyen bkur bgyis nas yi ger bris sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:430a-7: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 'thob par 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:430a-8: de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i yon tan de dag thams cad kyang 'thob par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:430a-9: des ji ltar bsam pa thams cad yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:430a-10: de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang byang bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:430a-12: bro nad rnams dang bral bar yang 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:430a-14: byang chub sems dpa' yang mthong bar 'gyur lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:430a-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:430a-16: zhes bya ba byin te; rigs kyi bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:430a-20: khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs zin gyi shod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:430b-0: de nas byang chub sems dpa' @430b sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas te gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:430b-1: na ma: sarba ta th'a ga t'a n'am/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:430b-2: sarba a'a sh'a pa ri p'u ra k'a n'am/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:430b-3: na ma a'arya ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:430b-6: ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:430b-10: dhi ri dhi ri dhi ri /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:430b-13: sarba p'a pa ksha yam ka ri /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:430b-16: bo dhi tsitta ma ma na si ku ru /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:430b-21: sad tya aa dhishtha nam kri tam/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:430b-22: te na san tye na pa tsa ne na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:430b-23: sarba a'a sh'a me pa ri p'u ra ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:430b-24: buddha kshe ta ma pa ri sho dha y'a /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:430b-25: ma me kashtsi de ba he tham ka ro tu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:430b-26: buddha aa dhishth'a ne na sv'ah'a /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:430b-30: ya na ma ma k'a ya du shtsa ri ta ma b'a /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:430b-31: w'ag du shtsa ri ta ma b'a /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:430b-32: ma no du shtsa ri ta ma b'a /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:430b-37: ta th'a ga ta da ri sha nan tsa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:430b-38: aa ha ma dhi ka daksha mi bo dhi sa tya da ri sha na ma /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:430b-40: dad sa sva me da ri sha na ma /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:430b-41: sarba me ku sha l'a aa bhi bardhantu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:430b-42: na ma: sarba ta th'a ga t'a nan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:430b-43: na ma a'arya ba lo ki te shva ra ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:430b-45: sma ra pra ti dzny'a ma ma satva /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:430b-47: gzungs 'di brjod pa na sa chen po 'di rab tu g-yos shing gzha'i sgra chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:430b-48: lha'i me tog gi char dag kyang mngon par rab tu bab par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:431a-0: @431a *// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des legs so zhes bya ba byin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:431a-4: sems can chen po khyod sems can thams cad bskyab pa'i phyir re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:431a-5: 'jigs pa thams cad las srung bar byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:431a-6: las thams cad phyang bar phyed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:431a-7: sdang ba dang rmi lam ngan pa'i gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i gzugs 'di legs par smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:431a-8: bdag cag thams cad kyis kyang gzung bar bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:431a-10: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:431a-12: gang la la ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su bsgrags pa'i yon tan de dag mngon par 'dod cing lung bstan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:431a-13: kho bo'ang mngon sum du mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:431a-15: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:431a-16: longs spyod dang dbang phyug 'thob pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:431a-17: sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'dod pa des zla ba yar gyi ngo la lus legs par khrus byas shing gtsang la bsnyen te gnas pa 'phags pa yan lag brgyad pa la gnas par byas la tshes brgyad nas brtsams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:431a-18: de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyogs su spos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:431b-0: bum pa gang ba @431b dag gis phyogs de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:431b-1: chos smra ba de'ang mchod pa byas nas lus legs par khrus byas pa gtsang mas gos dkar po bgos te me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:431b-5: byug pa sna tshogs dag gis mchod nas yi ger bri bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:431b-6: 'bri ba'i tshe na nyin gcig bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:431b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa la bla ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:431b-8: gus pa'i sems nye bar bzhag nas sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:431b-10: snying rje'i sems kyis nyi ma phyed tshun chad kyi bar de tsam du bri bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:431b-11: tshes brgyad nas brtsams te tshes bco lnga'i bar du nyin gcig bzhin du mchod pa'ang de bzhin bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:431b-12: cho ga 'di kho na bzhin du byas te bris na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:431b-13: de ma thag tu mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:431b-14: sdig pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang 'phel bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:431b-16: tshe de nyid la'ang lus bde pa 'thob par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:431b-23: ser sna dag srab mor 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:432a-0: des yi ger 'brir bcug nas kyang sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi gnas su de bzhin @432a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:432a-1: gshegs pa'i sku gzugs sku gdung dang bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:432a-2: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs sku gdung dang bcas pa zhal shar phyogs su bstan te bzhag la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:432a-6: mar me dag gis mchod pa shin tu rgya cher byas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:432a-7: tshes brgyad nas brtsams te tshes bco lnga'i bar du sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed par bya zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:432a-8: gtsang ma kha zas dkar po za ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:432a-9: bsnyen te gnas pa 'phags pa yan lag brgyad pa la gnas pa grogs po yid gcugs pa dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:432a-13: ser sna yongs su spangs pas nyin gcig bzhin du mchod pa rgya chen po byas te dus gsum du bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad rtsa brgyad bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:432a-17: mar me dag kyang phul la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:432a-18: dus gsum du sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad rtsa brgyad 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs la gtor bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:432a-19: lag na rdo rje la'ang bdug spos kyis bdug par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:432a-20: phyogs bcur phyag byas la nub phyogs kyi lha mo 'jigs byed ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:432a-21: shar phyogs kyi dpe med ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:432b-0: steng gi phyogs kyi dung can ma la sogs pa la phyogs bzhir gtor ma ro sna @432b tshogs dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:432b-3: 'bras chan dag kyang gtor bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:432b-4: des na de la rnam par g-yeng ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:432b-5: 'jigs pa 'ga' yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing sems 'khrul bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:432b-6: sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad po thams cad la bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad byas la bskul bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:432b-7: cho ga 'di kho na bzhin du sngar bsnyen pa byas la de nas tshes bco lnga'i nang par sa phyogs der bum pa gang ba bzhi bzhag la bdug spos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:432b-10: ga bur dag kyang gzhag mar me kha bzhi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:432b-16: ba dan sna tshogs dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:432b-17: gser dngul gyi snod dag gis legs par brgyan la sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i 'o thug dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:432b-20: gzhan yang ci 'byor pa'i lha bshos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:432b-21: gtor ma dag kyang phyogs bzhir gzhag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:432b-22: sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad la snga ma bzhin du bzlas brjod lan re byas la phyogs bzhir gtor ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:432b-23: de nas sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad phrag gsum la bzlas brjod lan re byas la; re re nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs la bsnun par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:432b-24: de nas gzugs de 'gul bar 'gyur zhing sgra skad chen po'ang 'byung bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:433a-2: de nas las thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:433a-3: dgos pa thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur zhing de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:433a-4: byang chub sems dpa'i sa thob par yang 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:433a-5: sems can thams cad kyis phyag bya ba'i 'os su'ang 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:433a-10: nad thams cad yongs su spangs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:433a-15: blon po rnams kyang de la lta 'dod cing gces spras byed par yang 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:433a-16: nyon mongs pa thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:433a-20: nam du'ang sdug pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:433a-23: brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:433a-24: gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:433a-27: sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:433a-29: 'chi ba'i tshe na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:433a-30: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:433a-31: byams pa la gnas shing chos ston bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byed pa'i bar du'ang 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:433b-0: sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji lta bu @433b 'dod pa dag gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:433b-1: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rigs chen po'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:433b-2: gang du rjes su dran par byed pa der skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:433b-3: gzhan yang yon tan stong phrag du ma dag kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:433b-8: gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:433b-9: yon tan mang po'i 'byung gnas lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:433b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs ma mchis par mnyan par yang rngo mi thogs la gzung bar yang rngo mi thogs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:433b-12: klog par yang rdo mi thogs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:433b-13: mchod par yang rngo mi thogs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:433b-14: yi ge bri bar yang rngo mi thogs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:433b-15: yi ger 'brir stsal bar yang rngo mi thogs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:433b-16: dad par yang rngo mi thogs lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:433b-17: gal te mthong bar gyur na'ang nyan par mi 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:433b-18: gal te nyan par gyur na'ang de sems rnam par g-yengs pas nyan par 'gyur zhing dad par mi 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:433b-19: bsnyen bkur bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:433b-20: gal te bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'gyur na'ang nyon mongs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:433b-21: gnod sems dang bcas pa'i sems kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'gyur lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:433b-23: yi ger 'brir stsal bar gyur na'ang de gzhan dag yid la bgyid par 'gyur lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:433b-24: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:433b-25: 'di ltar de'i sngon gyi las kyi 'bras bu lags pa'i slad du ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:434a-0: de ni las de nyams su myong bar bgyid @434a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:434a-1: cing the tshom skye bar 'gyur lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:434a-2: mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyid pas kyang lan gsum bsgrubs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:434a-3: re ba thams cad yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:434a-4: de la nem nur ma mchis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:434a-5: yid gnyis ma mchis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:434a-6: the tshom mi bskyed par bgyi lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:434a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:434a-11: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:434a-12: de nas gnod sbyin mo chen mo dpe med ma bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:434a-15: ras bcos bu zung dag gis mchod par byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:434a-17: bdag gis 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das yul ko'u sha mbhi na dbyangs can gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs pa'i spyan sngar sems can thams cad kyi don dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:434a-19: bde ba'i slad du dam bcas pa brjod par rjes su dran lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:434b-0: bdag @434b cag gis kyang rig sngags 'chang ba thams cad kyi snying po dag 'tshal lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:434b-1: de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:434b-2: skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:434b-3: re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:434b-7: dge bsnyen ma rnams kyi don du bdag rjes su gzung du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:434b-8: na ma: sarba ta th'a ga t'a n'am/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:434b-17: sarba bidy'a dha ra na ma skri te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:434b-18: ha sa ha sa kim tishtha si /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:434b-21: aa ba ra na bi bh'u shi t'angge /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:434b-26: sarba aarthan me s'a dha ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:434b-33: bi sha de bi sha de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:434b-38: tan me bidya ma pra yo dza na ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:434b-40: sarba a'a sh'a me pa ri p'u ra ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:434b-41: buddha aa dhishth'a ne na sv'ah'a; bcom ldan 'das /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:434b-42: gang la la yon tan 'tshal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:434b-44: sems can thams cad dbang du bgyid par 'tshal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:434b-45: nor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:434b-47: rig sngags 'chang chen po nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:435a-0: bdag kyang mngon sum du mthong bar 'tshal ba des chos brgyad kyi gdugs la ras dkar po gsar pa kha tshar ma @435a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:435a-1: bkum pa skra bsal ba la ri mo mkhan gtsang ma bsnyen te gnas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:435a-2: 'phags pa yan lag brgyad pa la gnas pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:435a-3: tshon rtsi spyin dang ma 'bags pa snod gsar pa'i nang du stsal bas dbus su de bzhin gshegs ba'i sku gzugs chos ston pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa bri bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:435a-4: g-yas phyogs su 'phags pa rdo rje khro bo rad pa dkar po 'tshal ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:435a-8: se mo dos brgyan pa rdo rje gsor zhing mchis pa bri bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:435a-9: g-yon phyogs su ni gnod sbyin mo chen mo dpe med ma 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i mdog ltar dkar sham du mchis la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:435a-11: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:435a-12: sug pa na padma thogs shing yang dag par dbugs 'byin pa'i tshul du mchis pa bri bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:435a-13: de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma bsnyen te gnas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:435a-14: 'phags pa yan lag brgyad pa la gnas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:435a-17: nas chan 'o ma dang sbyar ba 'tshal bas sngar bsnyen pa bgyi la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:435a-18: tshes brgyad kyi gdugs la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung dang bcas pa'i gnas gtsang mar dang por kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:435a-19: lag na rdo rje la me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:435a-21: spos dag gsol bar bgyi zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:435b-3: ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:435b-4: chan sna tshogs kyi gtor ma dag gtor la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:435b-8: mar me sna tshogs dag gis mchod pa bgyis nas dus gsum du sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad phrag gsum la bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad phrag gsum bgyi zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:435b-9: re re nas gnod sbyin mo chen mo dpe med ma'i gzugs de la bsnun par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:435b-10: de nas zla ba nya'i tshes bco lnga'i gdugs la'ang chog 'di nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:435b-11: gzhan yang ci 'byor ba dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:435b-16: shing mu sa dag kyang dbul /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:435b-17: 'bru mar dri bda' ba'i zhugs mar kha gnyis kyang dbul bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:435b-18: de nas bdag der rang gi gzugs kyis gnas par bgyi zhing dam pa ci 'tshal ba'ang stsal bar bgyi ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:435b-20: nam mkha' la mchis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:435b-21: lus mi snang bar bgyi ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:435b-23: stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:435b-27: pha rol gyi sems 'tshal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:435b-29: dam pa ci 'tshal ba'ang stsal bar bgyi lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:435b-30: des kyang sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:436a-4: dge 'dun gyi nor 'phrog pa yongs su spang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:436a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dang ba mi phyed par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:436a-7: gal te mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid ba zhig gis kyang lan gsum bsgrubs te bdag gis ma stsal bar gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:436a-9: bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:436a-10: gal te sangs rgyas la ma dad par gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:436a-11: yid gnyis su gyur pa gang lags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:436a-12: sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos bgyis nas 'gyod par mi bgyid pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:436a-14: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sems dang ldan pa gang lags pa de dag la'ang bdag mthong ba stsal bar bgyi zhing thob par yang bgyi lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:436a-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin mo chen mo dpe med ma le legs so zhes bya ba byin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:436a-19: sring mo khyod kyis sems can thams cad kyi don du sdig pa kun tu spyod pa'i sems can rnams la gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di lta bu 'di dag smras zhing dam bca' ba'ang byas pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:436b-0: khyod snying rje chen po 'di lta bu 'dis sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs @436b pa'i byang chub la rab tu 'god nus par 'gyur gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:436b-1: khyod kyis de bzhin du gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:436b-2: de nas lha mo chen mo dung can mas bcom ldan 'das la me tog sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:436b-3: spos sna tshogs dag gis mchod pa byas te bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:436b-5: bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:436b-6: chos smra ba de dag kyang bsrung ba'i slad du dam bca' bar bgyi zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:436b-7: re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams stsal bar bgyi lags kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:436b-8: de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rjes su gnang bar mdzad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:436b-9: na ma: sarba ta th'a ga ta n'i /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:436b-11: aom sham khi ni de bi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:436b-21: a'a yu dha dha ra ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:436b-22: yu yu a'a yushpa la na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:436b-26: de hi me ba ra na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:436b-29: gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag lus la gnas par bgyis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:437a-1: du bgyi ba'ang 'phel bar 'gyur lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:437a-3: lha'i gnas su ci 'byor ba'i gtor ma phyogs bzhir stsal la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:437a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa la bdug spos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:437a-5: pog dkar po dag gis mchod pa rgya cher bgyi zhing zhugs mar dag kyang phul la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:437a-6: dgung nyi shu rtsa gcig tu byams pa la gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:437a-7: des par gnas shing bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad bgyis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:437a-8: dam pa'i chos spong ba ma gtogs pa rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi lags so; ;de nas bcom ldan 'das dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:437a-9: ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor de dag gis lha mo chen mo dung can ma la lags so zhes bya ba byin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:437a-12: legs so; ;yon tan mang po dang ldan pa'i dam bca' ba 'di ni legs par smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:437a-14: khyod kyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin du gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:437a-15: de nas lha mo chen mo 'jigs byed mas bcom ldan 'das la gser gyi me tog dag gis mchod pa byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:437a-17: bdag gis kyang chos smra ba de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:437a-18: chos nyan pa de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:437a-19: yi ger 'bri ba de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:437b-0: mchod pa bgyid @437b pa de dag gi don du re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:437b-7: tshe ring bar bgyid pa; dgra thams cad dbang du bgyid pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams stsal bar bgyi ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:437b-12: dge bsnyon nam; dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig 'dzin tam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:437b-17: mchog tu gus pas ji skad gsungs ba'i sgrub pa la sgrub par bgyid na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:437b-19: bdag gis de bsrung bar bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:437b-20: yongs su bskyang bar bgyi zhing dam pa ci 'tshal ba'ang stsal bar bgyi ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:437b-22: dbang phyug dag gis mi brel bar bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:437b-26: 'khrug slong dag lus rgyal bar bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:437b-27: tshe phun sum tshogs pa nye bar bsgrub par bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:437b-28: de'i yul dang grong khyer dag kyang yongs su bskyang bar bgyi lags kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:437b-29: de'i slang du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rjes su gnang bar mdzad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:437b-30: na ma: sarba ta th'a ga ta n'am/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:437b-32: aom sham khi ni de bi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:437b-41: ba sha bsta dha dha ri ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:437b-42: yu yu aa yushpr'a la le /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:438a-3: de hi me pa ra na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:438a-6: bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi don du de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs shing de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su gnang ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag smras lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:438a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:438a-10: mar me dag gis mchod pa bgyis la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:438a-12: ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gtor ma dag stsal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:438a-13: ci dang ci 'tshal ba yid la bgyis shing bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mchod pa bgyis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:438a-14: re ba de dang de dag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:438a-15: gang la la bdag rang gi gzugs mthong bar 'tshal ba des tshes brgyad kyi gdugs la ras dkar po gsar pa kha tshar ma bkum pa skra ma mchis pa la ri mo mkhan gtsang ma 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad yongs su bzung bas tshon rtsi spyin dang ma 'bags pa snod gsar pa'i nang du stsal bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:438a-16: dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs chos ston pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa bri bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:438a-17: g-yas phyogs su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug chos kyi 'bel ba'i gtam ston pa bri bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:438b-0: g-yon phyogs su ni lha mo chen mo 'jigs byed ma 'dam bu @438b mda' rgyu'i mdog ltar dkar sham du mchis la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:438b-2: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:438b-4: bgrang phreng thogs shing yang dag par dbugs 'byin pa'i tshul du mchis pa bri bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:438b-5: de nas rig sngags 'chang gcang mas sngar bsnyen pa bgyi la tshes brgyad nas tshes bco lnga'i bar du mchod rten sku gdud dang bcas pa'i gnas su me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:438b-8: me tog phreng dag gis mchod pa bgyi zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:438b-11: 'bras chan gyi gtor ma dag gtor la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:438b-14: mar me sna tshogs dag gis mchong pa rgya cher bgyi zhing lha bshos dkar po dag kyang phul la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:438b-15: gtor ma ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:438b-16: gzhan yang ci 'byor pa dag stsal nas sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:438b-17: snying rje'i sems kyis sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad la bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad bgyi zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:438b-18: re re nas lha mo chen mo 'jigs byed ma'i gzungs de la 'phang bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:438b-19: de nas bdag der rang gi gzugs kyis gnas par bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:438b-20: dam pa ci 'tshal ba'ang stsal bar bgyi ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:438b-21: rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:438b-22: nam mkha' la mchi ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:439a-2: bro nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:439a-3: pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rab tu gzhom pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:439a-4: sems can thams cad la byams pa skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:439a-5: gzhan yang ci 'tshal pa'i las dag kyang bgyi lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:439a-7: gal te dam pa'i chos spong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:439a-10: dge 'dun dag la the tshom du gyur pa gang lags pa ma gtogs par mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyid pa zhig lags na'ang bdag gi re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par ma bgyis par gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:439a-12: bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:439a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; sring mo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:439a-16: sring mo khyod sems can thams cad kyi don dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:439a-19: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'ang yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:439a-22: de'i phyir khyod kyis rtag tu dam bcas pa 'di dran par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:439a-23: de nas de'i tshe sa chen po 'di rab tu g-yos shing lha'i me tog gi char dag kyang mngon par rab tu bab pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:439a-24: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag gis kyang legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:439b-1: khyod kyis sems can thams cad kyi re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i dam bca' ba 'di ni legs par smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:439b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:439b-5: rigs kyi bu mo da chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'bri ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:439b-9: yang dag par ston pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:439b-11: mchid ton du bgyid pa des bsod nams 'thob par 'gyur lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:439b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:439b-13: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:439b-14: de'i phyir de khyod nyid la dri yi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:439b-15: khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:439b-16: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:439b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa la ni ma gzigs pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:439b-21: rnam par mi mkhyen pa mi mnga' bas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bka' stsal du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:439b-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:439b-24: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'bri ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:439b-28: yang dag par ston pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:440a-0: kha ton du byed pa las bsod @440a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:440a-1: nams 'thob par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni dpes brjod par yang mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:440a-8: mu tig dag gis sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par byas te rtser bcug kyang sems can de dag skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:440a-16: 'khrug pa dag las yongs su thar par mi 'gyur ba nyid yin zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:440a-17: lo 'bum du 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis rtser bcug kyang sems can de dag sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:440a-20: yi dvags kyi yul dag las yongs su thar par mi 'gyur ba nyid de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:440a-21: sems can rnams kyi phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan cing mchod pa byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:440a-23: de'i don kyang mnyan cing nan tan gyis sgrub par byed pa ni skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:440b-0: gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams @440b cad las yongs su thar bar kho nar 'gyur bas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas 'di'i bsod nams kyi ched kyi dpe mi mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:440b-2: gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:440b-8: gang gi phyir dbyig yungs 'bru tsam yongs su gtong bar byed dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:440b-15: rgyan gcig tsam zhig yongs su gtong bar byed dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:440b-16: yi ger 'bri ba'am; yi ger 'brir 'jug gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:440b-22: gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par byed pa gang yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:440b-23: gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa mngon sum du bzhugs pa la lo 'bum du me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:440b-25: spos dang; me tog phreng dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:440b-29: ba dan dag gis mchod pas mchod par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:440b-31: bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:440b-34: skyed mos tshal dag byed du bcug gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:441a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyir rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten @441a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:441a-1: 'phang du dpag tshad phyed pa brgya'am stong byed du bcug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:441a-2: de dag la lo 'bum du mchod pa dag gis mchod par byed pa bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:441a-3: gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'bri ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:441a-9: yang dag par ston pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:441a-10: de pas chos bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba ches mang du skye bar 'gyur gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:441a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon sum du mchod pa byed pa de ni de lta ma yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:441a-12: sems can thams cad la sbyin pa byin zhing 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis rtser bcug pa'ang de lta ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:441a-19: blon po de dag gis rtag par rgyun du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mchod par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:441a-20: gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sgrog par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:441a-22: don kyang nye bar sgrub par byed pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'du shes bskyed par bya zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:441a-23: de dag gis bsnyen bkur byas te chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:441a-27: yid la bya zhing 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:441b-0: bdag cag don med pa la don @441b 'du shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:441b-1: mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:441b-2: sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:441b-3: lam ma yin par zhugs pa la lam nye bar ston pa gang yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:441b-4: bdag cag sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:441b-6: gshin rje'i 'jig rten las yongs su thar par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do snyam du sems bskyed par yang bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:441b-7: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:441b-9: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa mdzad pa chen pos yang dag par bshad lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:441b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:441b-12: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshen lho phyogs kyi rgyud na spyod par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:441b-20: blon po snod du gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:441b-23: klog par byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:441b-28: nub phyogs kyi rgyud dag na spyod par 'gyur na'ang de na gang dag nyan par mi byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:441b-29: dad par mi byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:442a-1: ches par mi byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:442a-2: mchod par mi byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:442a-13: glu sna tshogs kyis rnam par g-yengs shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:442a-15: ser sna'i dran pas nyan par mi byed pa'i sems can de dag ni bdud kyi las la mngon par brtson pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:442a-16: de dag ni skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:442a-28: yi dvags kyi yul rnams las yongs su mi thar pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:442a-31: rigs kyi bu mo bdag nyid ngan song thams cad las yongs su thar par 'dod pa de dag gis bsnyen bkur byas te chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mchod par bya zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:442a-32: gzhan dag la yang dag par bstan par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:442a-38: dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:442b-0: @442b gnod pa sna tshogs dag la'ang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mchod pa byas te bklag par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:442b-1: rgyal mtshan btsugs pa me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:442b-4: rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs dag gis mchod cing phyogs bzhir gtor ma gtor la me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:442b-6: spos dag gis phyag byas te 'jug par byas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:442b-9: 'go ba'i nad thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:442b-10: de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal la to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:442b-11: sngon gyi srid par 'dren pas gang gsungs shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:442b-12: sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:442b-13: da ltar ngas kyang khyod la bshad pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:442b-14: ting 'dzin 'di ni gzung zhig kun dga' po //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:442b-15: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dkon mchog la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:442b-16: gang gis khams gsum sbyin par byin pa bas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:442b-17: mdo sde 'di la mchod pa byas na ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:442b-18: sbyin pas de yid dper yang mi phod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:442b-19: gang gis sangs rgyas la ni dad byas te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:442b-20: tshad med gtsug lag khang dag brtsigs pa bas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:442b-21: gang zhig mdo 'di 'dzin pa gang yin pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:442b-22: de ni de bas bsod nams mang por 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:442b-23: gang zhig me tog gcig tsam 'thor byed cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:442b-24: gos dang phreng ba byug pa de bzhin te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:442b-25: ting 'dzin 'di la bsnyen bkur byed gyur na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:442b-26: bsod nams tshogs char snga ma de mi 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:443a-2: karsha pa ni'i sbyin pa sbyin byed cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:443a-3: byang chub phyir ni byams pa'i sems bskyed na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:443a-4: de ni de bas bsod nams mang po 'thob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:443a-5: byang chub sems dpa' gang gis sems can la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:443a-6: ting 'dzin 'di bshad lung phog de bzhin du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:443a-7: bla med byang chub phyir ni bkod gyur na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:443a-8: de yi bsod nams dper yang mi bzod 'gyur; ;de ltas phan yon 'di dag thos nas kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:443a-9: sems can kun la de bzhin byams byas te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:443a-10: mdo 'di gzung zhing yi ger bri bar bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:443a-11: bklag par bya zhing de bzhin bshad par bya; ;rga dang de bzhin na 'chis gnod gyur cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:443a-12: sdug bsngal rab drag brgya yis yongs gdungs la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:443a-13: sems dmyal yi dvags rnams su skye ba na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:443a-14: phyi ma'i dus na 'gyod par gyur ta re //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:443a-15: 'chi ba'i dus na yid skrag 'jigs gyur la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:443a-16: yang dang yang du sngam pa 'dod byed cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:443a-17: bdag gi dpung gnyen skyabs su 'gyur ba zhes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:443a-18: byis pa'i blo can phan tshun rtog ga re //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:443a-19: gang phyir de bzhin gshegs pa ma mchod cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:443a-20: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun nor 'phrog pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:443a-21: mi zad gshin rje'i 'jig rten khrid 'gyur zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:443a-22: phyin chad rtag tu skyabs 'gyur 'ga' yang med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:443a-23: bu smad yod min nye du rtsa lag med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:443a-24: yul 'khor yod min bzhad gad 'jo sgeg med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:443a-25: nor dang 'bru dang de bzhin gos dang rgyan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:443b-0: @443b kun spangs sdug bsngal yang dang yang mi zad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:443b-1: ting 'dzin 'di la dad par ma byas pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:443b-2: de 'dra'i sdug bsngal mi zad myong 'gyur bas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:443b-3: sdug bsngal 'di dang phan yon de thos na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:443b-4: byis pa'i blo yang su zhig dad mi skyed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:443b-5: de phyir rtag tu dge slong pha ma dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:443b-6: dge bsnyen rnams dang rgyal pos khor zug dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:443b-7: mdo sde 'di ni rtag tu gzung bya zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:443b-8: 'dzin pa la yang rtag tu bsnyen bkur bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:443b-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:443b-11: bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:443b-12: ston pa'i 'du shes kyis bcang bar bgyi zhing sems can thams cad la yang dag par bstan par bgyi lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:443b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:443b-14: kun dga' bo; gal te khyod kyis ngas chos gang bstan pa mnyan te kun bzung ba de dag thams cad 'phang bar mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:443b-17: des ni khyod kyis nga la nyes pa byas par mi 'gyur zhing gus par ma mnyan par yang mi 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:443b-18: nyan thos nyid ma yin par yang mi 'gyur gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:443b-19: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang par mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:443b-22: yang dag par ston par mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:443b-23: yid la mi byed na ni des na khyod kyis nga la nyes pa byas par 'gyur zhing gus par ma mnyan par yang 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:444a-1: nyid yin par yang mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:444a-4: khyod kyis phu dud byas te chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bcang bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:444a-5: d'i ni phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:444a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na srog chags drug khri lan pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:444a-7: byang chub sems dpa' bdun brgyas ni ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:444a-9: sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad par skye bar lung bstan pa thob par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:444a-11: nyon mongs pa thams cad las rnam par grol te mi khom pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:444a-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:444a-17: slad ma'i dus slad ma'i tshe na rigs kyi bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:444a-18: rigs kyi bu mo nyan par bgyid pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:444a-21: mchod par bgyid pa de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:444b-0: yi ger 'bri bar bgyid pa de dag @444b la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa bgyid par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:444b-1: de dag kyang ji lta bu 'tshal ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa dag tu lung bstan pa lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:444b-2: slad ma'i dus slad ma'i tshe na sems can gang bzhad gad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:444b-7: rol mo'i sgra dag la sna tshogs su g-yang ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:444b-10: gti mug gi mun pa che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:444b-11: rtsed mo la dga' bar 'du shes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:444b-12: mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:444b-14: ser snas yongs su zin cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:444b-18: glo ba chos par mi bgyid /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:444b-22: nan tan gyis sgrub par mi bgyid pa de dag ni ngal ba 'di yid byung bar bgyis shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:444b-23: sngon gyi las kyi 'bras bu de yongs su bas par bgyis nas sdug bsngal ba yid mi bde ba sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:444b-24: sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:444b-25: de'ang bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag du mar sdug bsngal nyams su myong nas yang slar sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:444b-27: gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams su skye bar 'gyur lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:444b-28: mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi dbang gis yun ring por rjes su 'gyod par 'gyur lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:445a-1: yid legs par bsdam par bgyi zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:445a-4: dge 'dun dag la'ang dad pa mi phyed par bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:445a-5: sems can thams cad la'ang byams pa'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:445a-8: 'chal ba'i tshul khrims yongs su spangs pa'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:445a-9: khro ba yongs su spangs pa'i sems su bgyi lags so; ;de nas ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor de dag gis rang rang gi bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la lha'i me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:445a-16: aa la la zhes ca co dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:445a-20: glu dbyangs dag gi mchod pa byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:445a-21: lags so zhes bya ba gsol te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:445a-25: sems can thams cad kyi don dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:445a-26: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yun ring du gnas par bgyi pa'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs chen po 'di shin tu legs par bka' stsal lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:445a-27: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:445a-29: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:445a-31: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:445b-0: de'i phyir khyod @445b kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rjes su gnang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:445b-1: byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnon pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:445b-2: rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa 'dus pa chen po zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:445b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs sems can la gzigs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:445b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:445b-6: lag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:445b-7: nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:445b-10: 'jig rten skyong ba de dag thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:445b-11: rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:445b-12: gnod sbyin chen mo dpe med ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:445b-18: 'phrog ma la sogs pa de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:445b-26: lto 'phye chen po de dag thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:445b-27: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor ji ltar lhags pa de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:446a-0: dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor rnams yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis @446a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:446a-1: gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:446a-2: 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs sems can la gzigs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:446a-3: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:446a-5: zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba bandhe ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-004:446a-6: bande klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa /
